name: Sweet Dream (itch) (xcc_89)
description: This is the first time that I have used Unity. Very excited to make my own game! I always had dreams of running on the cloud and floating in the sky, so I made this game. Sweet Dream is my fictional world. This world is built in the air, and many things lose gravity. Different geometries interact, finally enabling a ball bumped into a bowling wall. I find it very interesting that energy could be transferred to one another, just like life is a knock-on effect.
